title: OmegaStarScream
author: OmegaStarScream
created_time: March 02, 2025, 03:46:50 PMLast edit: March 07, 2025, 09:28:46 AM by OmegaStarScream
content: I can't say I was not expecting this with the people that were around him and Eric Trump. XRP Founder, Cardano's Founder etc. I do find it stupid, because not even ADA holders use ADA but well...EDIT: Bitcoin and Ethereum are also going to be included in the strategic reserve.EDIT 2 (7th of March 2025):  Trump has officially signed a bitcoin strategic reserve. The reserve will include the current holding of the U.S goverment, but the secretary of treasury and commerce is authorized to introduce plans to buy more bitcoin, as long as it doesn't cost the taxpayers anything. See here: https://www.whitehouse.gov/fact-sheets/2025/03/fact-sheet-president-donald-j-trump-establishes-the-strategic-bitcoin-reserve-and-u-s-digital-asset-stockpile/What are your thoughts on this?

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on March 02, 2025, 03:46:50 PMWhat are your thoughts on this? Although I tend to be pessimistic even it's worse than I've expected.Well, I'm laughing here all alone. Omg! It's the most pathetic "reserve" I could think of!PS. I'm curious what Trump's Bitcoiner supporters think on this!

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on March 02, 2025, 03:46:50 PMI can't say I was not expecting this with the people that were around him and Eric Trump. XRP Founder, Cardano's Founder etc. I do find it stupid, because not even ADA holders use ADA but well...What are your thoughts on this? I am surprised with this news, honestly and I did not expect it.But I spent some minutes to think about it, and my thinking is you know who is Donald J Trump, and he is smart, and knows well that it is easier to pump other cryptocurrencies than Bitcoin. It's my first thinking.A second thinking is he will possibly announce to add Bitcoin to this strategic reserve later. It's not big deal with him. He did it many times in his political career, changing quickly and oppositely.

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on March 02, 2025, 03:56:05 PM-snip-PS. I'm curious what Trump's Bitcoiner supporters think on this!People are losing their minds already on Twitter. I guess there's still hope with the wealth Sovereign fund? I believe I have seen an interview with the guy in charge of it, and he seems to be almost as bullish as Michael Saylor. Or maybe one of the states passing a law? https://bitcoinlaws.io/I'm just waiting for SOL's supporters to call for the "Flippening" right now, as ETH supporters did a few years back.

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: instead of bitcoin, he chose to make the three altcoins as reserves for the us. it's just a shame that out of all of them he chose those three altcoins, and didn't include bitcoin at all in the plan. though i really hope that he can at least prioritize bitcoin first, then later he includes other crypto, but too bad that he prefers to make those three altcoins as their reserves.i already smell the suspicion that he will manipulate those three altcoins.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Well I don't expect so much from Donald Trump, I don't want to be amongst those who worship him all just because what Crypto-currency can gain from some of his decisions.I believe with or without Donald Trump's decision the crypto-currency market can still thrive well especially Bitcoin.But I actually think so far Donald Trump hasn't been too poorly but fingers crossed, the lists of coins here may not favor Bitcoin but still in general it's a good on for Crypto-currency and maybe he may just fulfil all his promise to the Crypto-currency community.

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on March 02, 2025, 04:04:12 PMI'm just waiting for SOL's supporters to call for the "Flippening" right now, as ETH supporters did a few years back.Flippening call on Solana will appear but Solana fans will be disapointed like Ethereum supporters and Ripple supporters in past years. Bitcoin won't be flipped by any altcoin, because it can not be stopped and attacked easily like any altcoin in this market. Only Bitcoin has this technical and practical strength and together with its current big market cap against altcoins, there will be no flippening.https://buybitcoinworldwide.com/flippening/

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on March 02, 2025, 03:56:05 PM-snip-PS. I'm curious what Trump's Bitcoiner supporters think on this!Well... Apparently Bitcoin and ETH are also included. He just posted this on Truth social:I'm not sure how did he managed to forget about bitcoin since that's the main thing he promised on the Bitcoin Strategic reserve, but hi... at least we got it?

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Trump is the man if his word. He promised and now he is delivering it. 2025 will be the beginning of the real bull market of crypto it seems. If USA adds btc to its reserves, they can pay off their debts for free since btc will go rampage, and btc holders will be rich af. It will be a double kill.God bless Trump!If he can pull this off, Vance 2028!

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on March 02, 2025, 04:49:51 PMWell... Apparently Bitcoin and ETH are also included. He just posted this on Truth social:I'm not sure how did he managed to forget about bitcoin since that's the main thing he promised on the Bitcoin Strategic reserve, but hi... at least we got it?I was looking at the market just after he made the post, and the market reacted immediately with the price of ETH and SOL shooting up; the price of Bitcoin shortly followed with the inclusion after, but if it was not mentioned, we would have seen more dip because that would have affected confidence to an extent. It would have been a big headline if BTC was left out.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: ^ SOL to flip BTC?  They know its not working like that. If ETH didn't make it. SOL won't make t.I couldn't see the link where trump said those coins are among the reserves they are planning. But if this is what they want I guess its coming and Musk had not endorsed Doge to Trump? Damn it. I was expecting too much for Musk to keep shilling Doge but now it looks like he is going to abandon it.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: What surprises me about this is the emphasis on shitcoins, but if you think about it, it's not so surprising. Surely he has contacts with many interests in those cryptocurrencies and hence the inclusion. Although I am a bitcoin maximalist, I also have to admit that including some cryptocurrencies is not bad, but I would like to see the proportion first. If the first by far in terms of USD equivalent invested is bitcoin I will not see it so bad.

comments.author: headingnorth
comments.created_time: March 02, 2025, 05:09:52 PMLast edit: March 02, 2025, 11:33:42 PM by headingnorth
comments.body: The founders of XRP, ADA, SOL, ETH all paid off Trump to be included in the reserve which is why they were added. Bitcoin has no founders to pay him off which is why he excluded BTC at first and only mentioned it later like it was an afterthought.As usual Trump is for sale to the highest bidder. I was surprised he didn't include Trumpcoin and Melaniacoin in the reserve. But that will probably come later, along with Fartcoin and Pepecoin.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: So many coins in the strategic reserve list right now, from what was said during the campaign i thought we were dealing with only a BTC strategic reserve, with this latest information, i think we have to stop calling it that, it is the cryptocurrency strategic reserve. For the love of God i hope we do not see memecoins included in this strategic reserve list, if he can create one, he can add one, right, lol.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on March 02, 2025, 04:49:51 PMWell... Apparently Bitcoin and ETH are also included. He just posted this on Truth social:I'm not sure how did he managed to forget about bitcoin since that's the main thing he promised on the Bitcoin Strategic reserve, but hi... at least we got it?Check again; it has been deleted. The post including BTC and ETH can no longer be found just shortly after we saw it. What could have happened?

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on March 02, 2025, 05:15:44 PM-snip-Check again; it has been deleted. The post including BTC and ETH can no longer be found just shortly after we saw it. What could have happened?This whole thing feels like one big market manipulation operation, or is it just me being paraonid? Either way, it looks like the post is back (five minutes ago): https://truthsocial.com/@realDonaldTrump/posts/114093946326587357

comments.author: Proty
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on March 02, 2025, 03:46:50 PMI can't say I was not expecting this with the people that were around him and Eric Trump. XRP Founder, Cardano's Founder etc. I do find it stupid, because not even ADA holders use ADA but well...EDIT: Bitcoin and Ethereum are also going to be included in the strategic reserve.What are your thoughts on this? I wonder why he chooses this bunch of shitcoins into US crypto currency reserves I was expecting bitcoin to be the first crypto currency in that reserve however the effect of this on the price of bitcoin is really amazing. Bitcoin is heading back to $100k

comments.author: Patikno
comments.body: It is kinda weird that the United States only chooses XRP, SOL, and ADA as its Strategic Reserve, I can't even believe that Bitcoin is not included in their strategic reserve. I think many people are disappointed with this, especially Trump supporters who support Bitcoin. But even so, I feel like there is something hidden, in my opinion, there is a certain intention behind all of this, it could be their strategy to gain more profit in Crypto, especially in Bitcoin.

comments.author: adultcrypto
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on March 02, 2025, 03:46:50 PMI can't say I was not expecting this with the people that were around him and Eric Trump. XRP Founder, Cardano's Founder etc. I do find it stupid, because not even ADA holders use ADA but well...EDIT: Bitcoin and Ethereum are also going to be included in the strategic reserve.What are your thoughts on this? Glad you corrected your post because he has been vocal about bitcoin, including ADA, SIL and XRP in the post now confirms while he later change from using bitcoin to cryptocurrency which means they are planning to hold a huge bag of different selected cryptocurrency. The market has already responded positively to such news with bitcoin over 10% already. With this announcement, I'm more convinced that Trump will be making good with his promises on cryptocurrency. Perhaps the drop in price might just be for some of the big pockets to take their position.

comments.author: cr1776
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on March 02, 2025, 03:46:50 PM...What are your thoughts on this? ...That people can't read when it says "includes".  Everyone who has been paying attention knows it includes bitcoin.
